title: Map Diversification
body: {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} Does anyone have any good ideas about changes they wish to see in maps in the future? I recently been wondering if a 2 vs 2 map would work out, or at least be plausible for noncompetitive scene. Perhaps using a map similar to ARAM's Howling Abyss. I don't know much about custom games or if they have done a special event similar to this. Share your ideas!
